text.section: In this section, "discharge" includes leakage, seepage, or other release of a hazardous substance or material.

The immunity provided in subsection (b) of this section does not apply to a person:
Whose act or omission was the original cause of an actual or threatened discharge in whole or in part, and who would otherwise be liable for the act or omission; or
Who received compensation other than reimbursement for out-of-pocket expenses for rendering the assistance or advice.
Notwithstanding subsection (b) of this section, a person is liable for damages caused by that person's gross negligence or reckless, wanton, or intentional misconduct.
